summary: This mod adds Lara Croft from the game Tomb Raider (2013) as follower.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700][b][size=5][center]Lara Croft Follower Mod[/center][/size][/b][/color][size=1][center]by Firestorm1996[/center][/size]

This is my first Mod.

It add`s Lara Croft from the Tomb Raider game to Skyrim.
This mod should be totaly standalone.
Report if there are some bugs or incompatibilities with other mods.


[u][size=4]How to install[/size][/u]

Just copy the files into the Skyrim folder or install with Mod Manager.


[size=4][u]Mods I used

[/u][size=3]Hairstyle:[/size][u]
[/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/?][i][size=3]Ponytail Hairstyles v3_0 by Azar[/size][/i][/url][u]
[/u][size=3]
Body[/size]:[u]
[/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?][i][size=3]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/size][/i][/url][u]

[/u][size=3]Eye`s:[/size][u]
[/u][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/498/?][i]High Quality Eyes by Xenius[/i][/url]

Brow`s:
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?][size=3][i]Brows by Hvergelmir[/i][/size][/url][/size]
author: Firestorm
